pages.privacy-policy: Visionary Advisors | Expert Consulting Services Monday - Friday 8AM - 9PM visionaryadvisors@gmail.com Visionary Advisors Home About Us Home About Us Privacy Policy Welcome to Visionary Advisors. We are committed to protecting your personal information and your right to privacy. If you have any questions or concerns about this privacy notice or our practices with regard to your personal information, please contact us. We collect personal information that you voluntarily provide to us when you register on our website, express an interest in obtaining information about us or our products and services, or otherwise when you contact us. The personal information we collect may include your name, email address, postal address, phone number, and other similar contact data. We also collect passwords, password hints, and similar security information used for authentication and account access. We use the information we collect or receive to send administrative information to you, to protect our services, to enforce our terms, conditions, and policies, and to comply with legal and regulatory requirements. We only share information with your consent, to comply with laws, to provide you with services, to protect your rights, or to fulfill business obligations. We may process or share your data based on your consent, legitimate business interests, or for compliance with legal obligations. We will only keep your personal information for as long as it is necessary for the purposes set out in this privacy notice, unless a longer retention period is required or permitted by law. You have certain rights under applicable data protection laws. These may include the right to request access and obtain a copy of your personal information, to request rectification or erasure, to restrict the processing of your personal information, and if applicable, to data portability. If you wish to exercise any of these rights, please contact us. We will consider and act upon any request in accordance with applicable data protection laws. If you have questions or comments about this notice, you may contact us at visionaryadvisors@gmail.com. Visionary Advisors Home About Us Privacy Policy Terms and conditions +91 36815 85203 visionaryadvisors@gmail.com Hanuman Setu, Babuganj, Hasanganj, Lucknow, Uttar Pradesh 226003
pages.terms-conditions: Visionary Advisors | Transforming Business Visions Monday - Friday 8AM - 9PM visionaryadvisors@gmail.com Visionary Advisors Home About Us Home About Us Terms and Conditions Welcome to Visionary Advisors. These terms and conditions outline the rules and regulations for the use of our website. By accessing this website, we assume you accept these terms and conditions. Do not continue to use our website if you do not agree to all of the terms and conditions stated on this page. The following terminology applies to these Terms and Conditions, Privacy Statement and Disclaimer Notice and all Agreements: "Client", "You" and "Your" refers to you, the person log on this website and compliant to the Company’s terms and conditions. "The Company", "Ourselves", "We", "Our" and "Us", refers to our Company. "Party", "Parties", or "Us", refers to both the Client and ourselves. All terms refer to the offer, acceptance and consideration of payment necessary to undertake the process of our assistance to the Client in the most appropriate manner for the express purpose of meeting the Client’s needs in respect of provision of the Company’s stated services, in accordance with and subject to, prevailing law of Netherlands. Any use of the above terminology or other words in the singular, plural, capitalisation and/or he/she or they, are taken as interchangeable and therefore as referring to same. License: Unless otherwise stated, Visionary Advisors and/or its licensors own the intellectual property rights for all material on Visionary Advisors. All intellectual property rights are reserved. You may access this from Visionary Advisors for your own personal use subjected to restrictions set in these terms and conditions. You must not: Republish material from Visionary Advisors Sell, rent or sub-license material from Visionary Advisors Reproduce, duplicate or copy material from Visionary Advisors Redistribute content from Visionary Advisors This Agreement shall begin on the date hereof. Parts of this website offer an opportunity for users to post and exchange opinions and information in certain areas of the website. Visionary Advisors does not filter, edit, publish or review Comments prior to their presence on the website. Comments do not reflect the views and opinions of Visionary Advisors,its agents and/or affiliates. Comments reflect the views and opinions of the person who post their views and opinions. To the extent permitted by applicable laws, Visionary Advisors shall not be liable for the Comments or for any liability, damages or expenses caused and/or suffered as a result of any use of and/or posting of and/or appearance of the Comments on this website. Visionary Advisors reserves the right to monitor all Comments and to remove any Comments which can be considered inappropriate, offensive or causes breach of these Terms and Conditions. You warrant and represent that: You are entitled to post the Comments on our website and have all necessary licenses and consents to do so; The Comments do not invade any intellectual property right, including without limitation copyright, patent or trademark of any third party; The Comments do not contain any defamatory, libelous, offensive, indecent or otherwise unlawful material which is an invasion of privacy The Comments will not be used to solicit or promote business or custom or present commercial activities or unlawful activity. If you have questions or comments about this notice, you may contact us at visionaryadvisors@gmail.com. pages.about: Visionary Advisors | Strategic Business Solutions Monday - Friday 8AM - 9PM visionaryadvisors@gmail.com Visionary Advisors Home About Us Home About Us Discover Our Journey and Vision Founded in 2010, Visionary Advisors has grown from a small consulting firm into a leading player in the industry, renowned for our expertise, innovation, and commitment to client success. Our journey began with a mission to provide exceptional consulting services to businesses seeking to navigate complex challenges and achieve sustainable growth. Over the years, we have expanded our services, built a talented team of professionals, and established a reputation for excellence. Our founders, Jane Doe and John Smith, envisioned a company that would not only offer strategic advice but also partner with clients to implement solutions and drive tangible results. With backgrounds in finance, operations, and technology, they combined their skills and insights to create a consulting firm that stands out in its ability to deliver comprehensive and customized solutions. Our Values At Visionary Advisors, our values form the foundation of everything we do. We are driven by a commitment to integrity, ensuring that we uphold the highest standards in all our interactions and decisions. We believe that integrity is the cornerstone of trust, and we strive to build lasting relationships with our clients, partners, and colleagues based on honesty and transparency. Our client-focused approach places the needs and goals of our clients at the forefront of our efforts. We take the time to listen, understand, and tailor our services to meet the unique challenges and opportunities faced by each organization we work with. By putting our clients first, we ensure that our solutions are not only effective but also aligned with their strategic objectives. Excellence is a non-negotiable standard at Visionary Advisors. We are dedicated to delivering exceptional quality in every aspect of our work, from our consulting services to our client interactions. Our pursuit of excellence drives us to continuously improve, innovate, and exceed expectations. We believe that by setting high standards, we can achieve outstanding results for our clients. We champion the bold to achieve the extraordinary At Visionary Advisors, our team is our greatest asset. Each member brings a wealth of experience, expertise, and a passion for excellence that drives our success. We are proud to introduce the talented individuals who make up our team. John Doe Co-Founder & CEO Michael Brown Co-Founder & COO Emily Johnson Chief Financial Officer Jane Smith Chief Technology Officer What Our Clients Say Alex Visionary Advisors transformed our business strategy and helped us achieve unprecedented growth. Their expertise and dedication were evident from day one. The team provided actionable insights and worked closely with us to implement effective solutions. We couldn't be happier with the results and highly recommend their services. John Working with Visionary Advisors has been a game-changer for our company. Their innovative approach and deep understanding of our industry helped us navigate complex challenges and seize new opportunities. The team's professionalism and commitment to excellence are truly commendable. We look forward to continuing our partnership with them. Eva The financial expertise provided by Visionary Advisors has been instrumental in optimizing our operations and improving our bottom line. Their team is knowledgeable, responsive, and genuinely invested in our success. Thanks to their strategic guidance, we have been able to achieve our financial goals and position ourselves for long-term growth. Emily Visionary Advisors exceeded our expectations in every way. Their comprehensive consulting services addressed our unique needs and delivered tangible results. The team's collaborative approach and innovative solutions have significantly enhanced our operational efficiency. We highly recommend Visionary Advisors to any organization seeking to elevate their performance. Frequently Asked Questions What services does Visionary Advisors offer? Visionary Advisors offers a wide range of consulting services including business strategy, financial planning, market analysis, operational efficiency, and technology integration. Our goal is to provide tailored solutions that meet the unique needs of each client. How can Visionary Advisors help my business grow? We help businesses grow by providing strategic insights, optimizing operations, and identifying new market opportunities. Our team works closely with clients to develop customized plans that drive growth and improve overall performance. What industries does Visionary Advisors specialize in? Visionary Advisors specializes in a variety of industries including technology, finance, healthcare, retail, and manufacturing. Our diverse expertise allows us to understand and address the specific challenges faced by businesses in different sectors. How do I get started with Visionary Advisors? Getting started with Visionary Advisors is easy. Simply contact us through our website or call our office to schedule an initial consultation. We will discuss your business needs and determine how our services can best support your goals. Visionary Advisors Home About Us Privacy Policy Terms and conditions +91 36815 85203 visionaryadvisors@gmail.com Hanuman Setu, Babuganj, Hasanganj, Lucknow, Uttar Pradesh 226003
